channel.title: Client.jar Error
channel.description:
Okay, so I want to Jar and Sign my server's client to make a webclient, but when I try to run my client.jar (I actually named the file Webclient.jar) nothing happens. I had my Jar Maker generate a .bat file of my client so that I could see what the error is. This is what came up when I tried to run the client.bat (Webclient.bat). [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2j2hr9f.jpg[/img]
Does anyone know how to fix this? Could it be because my .class and .java files aren't in their own folders? When I put them in their own folders, my client is unable to open. Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks.
P.S. I used the Jar Maker from http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/. Also I have jkd 7.1.0_04 if that helps at all.

item.title: Client.jar Error
item.dc:creator: @silicoofficial silicoofficial
item.description:
@silicoofficial wrote:

ratio:

Sorry this reply is no help but, does that Jar maker actualy work? :x

It works for other people. It’s the exact same one from “Ric’s Webclient Tutorial”.

Read full topic
